title: Social Media Fame & The Evolution of the "Celebrity"
itunes:title: Social Media Fame & The Evolution of the "Celebrity"
itunes:subtitle: Diving into the Jennifer Aniston backlash on the dilution of the "Actor"
description:
This week we're tackling the backlash our beloved Jennifer Aniston faced after making some comments around the "dilution of the actor's job" due to the rise of social media fame across YouTube, Instagram and TikTok. Was she wrong in her commentary? Was she right? To try and answer these questions, we deep dive into the evolution of social media across the years, the differences between online celebrities/influencers versus traditional celebrities (even with the change in entertainment models from traditional to the expansion in streaming services), and what encompasses social media fame.



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
